name: Figgy's Fashion!
description:
In this class students will get to sew the new Figgy's patterns! After 3 classes your child will go home with at least three new garments to add to their wardrobe!  2 date options!

Fridays
January 31, Feb 7 th & 14th
3:40 - 5:40pm

Tuesdays
February 18, 25 & March 4th
3:40 -5:40pm

Class included patterns, fabric, thread and tracing paper.

name: Ruffle Skirt
description:
Perfect class for the girl that just can't get enough ruffles and fluff!  
A great class to learn how to create ruffles, a waistband and design to fit perfectly.

2 classes for this cutie!

Tuesdays February 4th & 11th
3:40 - 5:40pm

**Supplies are included in price
** pattern & photos by Tikatuly Designs

name: My Own Quilt
description:
In this class the student will learn how to create a strip quilt which included: cutting, piecing strips, add bating and backing and finally what it means to quilt.  This project is not something they'll grow out of but grow with and possibly pass down to their children one day.

Due to space limitation class is limited to only 5 students!! 

Supplies to create a quilt:  I'm leaving this up to you.  
Purchase your own or have me shop for you.

Here is your supply list if you choose to shop:
3 -  1/2 yds of solid fabric
3 -  1/4 yds of print fabric
Backing fabric 1 - 44" x 44"  (your choice of print or solid)
Quilt Batting   1 - 44" x 44"
Binding  5 yards

Finished quilt size: approx 40" x 40"

*beginner quilting class

4 week session  3:40-5:40 pm

Wednesdays
January 15th - February 5th

name: Friday Sewing Club
description:
The perfect stop in and sew something class for kids!
Choose from just one Friday a month to every Friday.
  
Each week I will work with the students on whatever project they'd like to choose wether it's a bag or a dress.  This class is for the student that has sewing experience and is 8 or older.

3:40 -5:40 pm

*****Supplies included in price*****

name: We Love To Sew!
description:
I should just name this class "Have Fun" because that's what we'll be doing (and sewing of course).
In this 3 series class we will be exploring the book "We Love To Sew".  The kids will get to pick out projects from the book which range from clothing to jewelry to accessories.  We'll work not only with fabric but also hot glue guns (my supervision), felt and other fun crafty stuff! 

I can't wait to see which projects the girls pick!!

Mondays
February 24th - March 10th

3:40 pm - 5:40 pm

*supplies included!!

name: Plushie!
description:
A great class to create a snuggly friend for life!  The kids can choose from a Fox, Piggy, Owl or Dog (I'm sure I can find more too) pattern and have a ball creating these cute critters!

 SOLD OUT
January 21st & 28th
3:40 -5:40pm

Tuesdays
March 11th & 18th
3:40 - 5:40pm

name: All Boy
description:
In this All Boy class the students will get the chance to choose one or two projects from the list below (due to requests):

1. Sports Bag
2. PJ's
3. Apron
4. T -shirt
5. Bed Pillows

This is a great class for the beginner or more intermediate level male sewist.  I keep the class to just 5 students for a bit more one on one interaction.  

Wednesdays
February 12th & 19th
3:40 - 5:40
Supplies included in price

name: SPRING BREAK CAMP OPEN SEW!
description:
If you can't hit the beach this year then join me for a week of sewing fun!
Choose to sew for one day or the whole week!!  In each class we will sew projects that interest your child:  skirts, plushies, T-shirts, bags and more!

March 24th - 27th
Monday -Friday 
9:30 -12:30pm  3 hours of open sew with supplies included in price!

name: Bubble Skirt
description:
The students have been asking to make this skirt for a long time and 2014 seemed like the perfect time!  This was my very first design for my pattern line over 8 years ago and it's still a favorite!

In this class the student will learn how to line and bubble a skirt by using my favorite technique.  They'll also learn how to add a sewn in 2" elastic! Class can be purchased with or without supplies included.  This skirt takes more fabric than the average skirt so the supply cost is a bit higher but in the end you get an adorable reversible bubble skirt!

Wednesdays
April 16th & 23rd

3:40 -5:40pm

Purchasing your own supplies?  You'll need:

1 yard of 2" elastic
2 yards of 1/" elastic
2 yards of Main Fabric
2 yards of Lining Fabric

name: Lounge Pants
description:
A new class for Figgy's Kids.  Using the Seraphic Pants by Figgy's the girls or boys will make a cozy pair of pants that can be worn around the house or around town.  Made with knit fabric but with touches of hip the students will learn how to create front top stitched seams, pockets and elastic waistband.

2 Classes (4 hours of sewing time)
March 19th  & April 4th (no class held March 26th)

3:40 -5:40pm

*photos by Figgy's & Noodle-head

name: Style Our Room!
description:
Kids love to decorate and this class is the perfect class to create some fun projects just for their room!  We'll make a super cool pennant banner, strawberry book ends and a small size pouf!

A great class to learn machine sewing and a bit of hand sewing techniques.  

Thursdays
April 3rd - 17th 
6 hours of class time

Choose to have the price include or not include supplies. 

3:40 -5:40pm

name: Go Anywhere Bag
description:
This is the perfect class for a new sewist or intermediate!  A fun bag to go and take anywhere.  The best part?  All the pockets.
Three roomy pockets on the front: great for sunglasses, keys, and your phone one large pocket on the back a slip pocket on the inside.  

Tuesdays
April 8th & 15th
3:40-5:40 pm

Supplies Included in Price
*photos and pattern by Noodlehead

name: Briar Tee
description:
Terrific class for the new or experienced sewist.
A great alternative to the basic t-shirt or sweater.  The high scooped front hem and low curved back creates a flattering look and cozy fit!

Ages 10 and up.

Fridays
April 11th & 18th
3:30 - 5pm

name: Gifts For Our Teachers
description:
This is a class just for giving.  This is a chance for the kids to make something special for that someone special.  Kids will have choices such as darling appliquéd apple napkins, tea towels, book bag or zipper pouches.  The teachers have loved seeing all the goodness the girls and boys have made this year and I know they'd love to have something special for an end of the year gift.

Wednesday May 28th
3:40 - 5:40 pm

*All Supplies are Included

name: Adults Only "Friday Night Sip & Sew"
description:
I have been receiving a lot of requests from my adult seamsters, beginners and experienced, for classes that teach quilting, bags, children's clothing, dresses and many others.  
Well, I think I have come up with a way to please all of your demands and they'll be wine too!  

This is also a great group ladies night idea!!

Come over the 4th Friday of every month to learn to sew whatever you choose and sip on a glass of wine or lemonade.  We can all sew whatever we like while enjoying each others company!  If you would like me to shop for you it would be an extra charge depending on the project.
Please email me for more information for supplies included.  :)

Click below for date options! 
Sign up for one or all of them.

The doors are open from 6:30 pm - 9:30 pm

name: Doll Party Camp
description:
A week all about the girls and their Doll!  Whether they are making clothes and accessories for their stuffy, barbie or American girl Doll there will be something for each of them.

In this camp we'll start by making a cozy sleeping bag and pillow for their special friend, next clothes and we'll finish the camp with accessories.

*beginner class

June 23rdth - 25th
10am - 12:30 pm

All Supplies are Included!!

name: Quilt Camp
description:
The perfect camp for a beginner or experienced seamster.  In this 3 day camp the kids will not only have the chance to learn how to quilt but they will have the chance to pick their own fabrics and design their own lap quilt.  

On the first day of camp we will be visiting A Common Thread Quilt shop where they'll pick out their own supplies, design and prep the quilt.  After that it's all about sewing, adding our batting and backing, quilting and binding!!

Class is great for girls or boys!!
Supplies & Snacks are included in the class price.

June 30th - July 2nd

Day 1   9:30 am - 2:30 pm  (Please pack a sack lunch)
Day 2 & 3  9:30 am - 1:00 pm   

*quilt photos by:
Film in the Fridge
Eat Play Sew
Quilt Therapy

name: Summer Lovin' Camp
description:
A perfect class to stop the, "I'm Bored" and turn it into The Best Summer Ever!. In this class the students will learn how to create the perfect Summer Tunic Dress or Top and a picnic blanket to lay under the stars at night.  This will be a Summer not to forget!

*For the boys a fun T or shorts and the blanket of course.

Tuesday - Friday
July 22nd - 25th
9:30am  -12:30pm

name: Beach Camp
description:
Are you ready for Summer?!!  
In this class we'll get you ready for all your summer fun.  We'll be making a Beach Toweling Poncho, a Big Beach Bag and an Easy Stretch Headband.

July 7th - 10th
9:30 am - 12:30 pm

name: You Say It's Your Birthday!
description:
What is more fun than a group of your closest pals and sewing on your big day!  A 3 hour class packed with fun, excitement and creativity. Complete with decorations too! There are many different class projects to choose from depending on your child's age from headbands to nightgowns we'll find the perfect project for her/him.  Halfway through the party we'll take a break for lemonade and whatever special treat mom or dad bring.  A little special gift just from Figgy's will be given to the birthday girl/boy at the end of the party.  

Parties are mostly booked on Saturdays and they are booking up fast!

The party is best for groups of 6 if you are looking for a bigger party please call me  971-300-6132

Supplies are included

name: Private Lessons
description:
If you would like to learn to sew something that is not listed on site or you just prefer sewing in a one on one setting, a private lesson is a great option for you.  This a great time for me to help with a project you just can't seem to finish on your own or if you've had a project in mind but you're not sure how it could all go together, I'm here for you!

Studio is fully stocked with 6 Bernina 350 machines & 2 Bernina Sergers.

One-on-one sewing lessons: $40/hour
Please call  971-303-6132 to schedule 

*Supplies are not included but a kit can be purchased.

name: Scissor Necklace
description:
**This is not a class**

This is the perfect gift for your little seamstress this Christmas!
These darling necklaces are created by my brother-in-law and created using stainless steel recycled bicycle parts.  I wear mine often and the kids always ask where I got mine.  There are only 6 available this holiday season!!

The scissor charm comes on a 16" or 18" waxed cotton thread wrapped with a handmade closures.

For more work by Jeff Walker please visit his Etsy shop:  
www.etsy.com/shop/Jeffwalkerjewelry

name: GIFT CERTIFICATE 50
description:
The perfect gift for a birthday, holiday or just because.
This certificate can be used for any class, camp or party!

name: GIFT CERTIFICATE 100
description:
The perfect gift for a birthday, holiday or just because.
This certificate can be used for any class, camp or party!

name: Flannel PJ's & Fleece Mittens
description:
The weather has turned chilly and what's better than warm cozy PJ's to snuggle up in?  Nothing except some fleece mittens!  In this 2 day class students will learn how to create the perfect fitting Pj's for at home and fuzzy mittens for on the go!  If we have time maybe even a scarf!

December 30th  & 31st
9:30 - 12 pm

Price includes all patterns, fabric, thread, tracing paper and time. :)

name: Cozy Robe OR Pj's
description:
You asked and I provide.  A terrific class for  BOYS!!!  

This cozy robe is a pattern from my book "Sewing for Boys" so I would say this class has a special little place in my heart. In this class the kids will learn how to make a classic style robe!  If this is your child's first time sewing or they've already made a robe the other option is comfy PJ's!

I suggest for beginners to start with the PJ's first. :)

Tuesdays January 7th & 14th
3:40 - 5:40pm

Purchase class with or without supplies included

name: I heart YOU!
description:
The perfect class to to show your love on Valentines day! And these are so much cuter than the grocery store boxed cards too :)

Monday, February 3rd  SOLD OUT 
3:40 - 5:40pm

Monday, February 10th
Early Dismissal Lake Oswego  Class time 1pm - 3:15pm

name: POUF!
description:
A perfect way to add some fun and style to their room or better yet for the family room.  Easy to make, yet dramatic in style. Large, comfy and cool pillows. Eye candy for your home!

Fridays January 10th & 17th
3:40pm - 5:40pm

Supply Options:

Purchase the class with supplies included 
OR
Purchase your own.  Supply list below.

**Pattern & Photos by Amy Butler**

FOR THE 24" GUM DROP PILLOW / OTTOMAN

Allow extra yardage for centering or matching a design on your fabric.

For 44” wide light to mid-weight fabric OR 54” heavier Home Dec fabric

  If using one fabric - 2 1/4 yards for the Main and Top Panels

OR

  If using 2 coordinating fabrics - 1 1/8 yards of each fabric for the Main Panels

  10” x 10” piece of a 3rd coordinating fabric for the Top Panel


  10 12 oz. bags of Nature-fil®  (stuffing)

  1 spool of coordinating all-purpose thread

name: American Girl Doll Clothes
description:
This is such a cute and fun class.  My favorite part is that the girls arrive with dolls in tow and are placed right next to the machine awaiting their new outfits!

*Supplies included in price

Two class day options:

January 20th
9:30am - 12pm

or

February 17th
9:30 - 12pm
